product_overview: Celest AI is a personal pocket oracle blending ancient astrological wisdom with AI precision, delivering hyper-personalized, real-time guidance to help users navigate their mental, physical, and emotional states.
core_goals: Encourage daily engagement through the Cosmic Vital Signs morning check habit.
Achieve user retention via the intelligent Oracle Chat interface.
Drive conversion with an onboarding funnel including a simulated annual payment gate (Vigor Anual).
key_features: Cosmic Onboarding collecting birth data with city autocomplete and calculating Solar, Lunar, and Rising signs.
Dashboard with Sync Rings showing Mind, Body, and Soul scores based on current planetary transits, plus action windows and daily AI-generated insights.
Oracle Chat AI persona offering empathetic, mystical yet grounded astrological guidance personalized with user birth chart and chat history.
Synastry module performing relationship compatibility analysis with a radar chart visualization over six axes.
user_flow_summary: User registers with birth data via Onboarding flow including city autocomplete and sees visual data security feedback.
User accesses Dashboard showing Mind, Body, Soul scores and actionable astrological insights including caution periods and optimal activity timings.
User interacts with Oracle Chat to receive personalized astrological advice, with AI understanding their natal map and prior conversation.
User utilizes Synastry feature to compare compatibility between two natal charts with graphical radar chart representation.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration with accurate birth chart calculation and city autocomplete functionality.
Dashboard accurately reflects real-time planetary transit calculations and displays correct Mind, Body, Soul scores.
Oracle Chat provides context-aware, personalized, empathetic, and reliable astrological guidance.
Synastry compatibility analysis correctly compares two charts and renders graphical radar visualization.
All frontend and backend components build without errors, pass linting, and meet SEO standards as per design.
Simulated payment gate functions correctly during onboarding to gauge user purchase intent.
